Owlhawk walks around and finally finds HotRod.

Owlhawk:  Hi.  Reconize me.

OOC: I've been out for 3 weeks, and while he's bigger,
stronger, and looks considerably different from
Sunhawk he should be able to reconize the voice.

--- RoboRick007 <rfa007@...> wrote:
> OOC: Ok, I'm done with School so I have nothing
> taking up my time. I'm ready to get to some RPing.
> 
> ::Hot Rod::
> 
> Hot Rod steps out of the CR chamber, now fully
> repaired, and the red and yellows of his body shine.
> 
> He walks down the halls of the base towards the
> bridge.
> 
> On his way he activates his comm link.
> 
> "Talos, this is Hot Rod. I'm kinda bored right now.
> You got anything I can do?"
> 
> ::Kup::
> 
> Sparks fly throughout the work area, as a torch
> works over an exo-skeleton. It stops and Kup backs
> away from the bench.
> 
> "Whew, almost there. Hopefully this Pred shell will
> be usefull," he says to himself.
>
